artist: Suzuki Harunobu; Author: Komatsuya Hyakki; Publisher: Nishimuraya Yohachi
life_date: Suzuki Harunobu, Japanese, 1725–1770; Komatsuya Hyakki, Author, Japanese, 1720–1793; Nishimuraya Yohachi, Publisher, Japanese
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Elegant Erotic Mane'emon (Fūryū enshoku Mane'emon 風流艶色真似ゑもん)
text: Mane'emon cowers under a blanket to hide from the fury of a pregnant wife who grabs her husband by his fundoshi to pull him away from a visiting niece. Mane'emon explains that in spite of the uproar the niece does remain at the house to assist with the childbirth.
title: Love Revealed, No. 4 from the book Elegant Erotic Mane'emon (Fūryū enshoku Mane'emon), vol. 1
